metadata.title: Convert PNG to WebP - Free Online Image Converter | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert PNG images to WebP format instantly. Batch convert up to 100 images. Reduce file size by up to 30% while maintaining quality. 100% free.

hero.desc: Convert PNG to WebP online for free. Simply drop your PNG images below to convert them to WebP in seconds.

intro.title: Modern Web Format
intro.content: WebP is a modern image format that provides 25-35% better compression than PNG while maintaining similar quality. Perfect for modern web applications.

scenes.title: Web Performance
scenes.desc: Convert PNG to WebP for faster website loading.

scenes.title: Mobile Apps
scenes.desc: Reduce app size with WebP format.

faq.q: How much smaller are WebP files?
faq.a: WebP files are typically 25-35% smaller than PNG files with similar quality.
WebP is supported by all modern browsers and mobile devices.
